channel.title: CVE Feed for SAML-Toolkits -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for SAML-Toolkits -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-45409|2024-09-11T21:03:29.185Z -- saml-toolkits -- ruby-saml
item.description: The Ruby SAML library is for implementing the client side of a SAML authorization. Ruby-SAML in <= 12.2 and 1.13.0 <= 1.16.0 does not properly verify the signature of the SAML Response. An unauthenticated attacker with access to any signed saml document (by the IdP) can thus forge a SAML Response/Assertion with arbitrary contents. This would allow the attacker to log in as arbitrary user within the vulnerable system. This vulnerability is fixed in 1.17.0 and 1.12.3.
